mainText: RIP Steve jobs, you have changed the world, you are an incredible man, no one will ever forget you, you are a legend that I honor, you have created so much and you have worked so hard, you had an incredible vision and words cannot describe my feeling and such right now, RIP Steve Jobs, I love you, I shall always love, honor and never forget you abs your impact, theres so much more I wanna say but words just can't describe... RIP Steve Jobs.
author: Franca
